thread.title: Zach
thread.title_full: Sportbike Track Gear reviewed by Zach

author: Zach
title: Zach
text: I had an issue with an order of Hotbodies Bodywork that was damaged on several pieces when I received it which was out of STG's control. They had an excellent response time on my request to have another one shipped out at no cost to me. They just asked for a few pictures of the damage and that was that. Excellent service so far all the way around.
